attributes.action: We want Countdown on a 2:45 on Channel 4 - EVERY DAY!
attributes.additional_details: Why should Channel 4 replace the legendary British TV quiz show Countdown, presented by the amazing Nick Hewer with the Cheltenham Gold Cup - horse racing has a very limited appeal. I call on the government to enforce laws that a sporting event cannot ruin the whole afternoon's programming - especially Countdown on Channel 4. Come on great Britain, sign this petition if you want to watch quality TV!
